duck: Optional Practical Training, a temporary employment authorization for F-1 students
Opt-out, to avoid receiving unsolicited product or service information
Option key, a modifier key on Apple keyboards
Occupied Palestinian Territory - The Palestinian territories or occupied Palestinian territories comprise the West Bank and the Gaza Strip.
Population Matters, (formerly known as the Optimum Population Trust), a UK charity devoted to tackling overpopulation.
opt definition: to make a choice; '''especially''' to decide in favor of something.
Opting out, a political expression in Canada, describing the intention of a province to remove itself from a program administered by the federal government
Opt in e-mail, the option to receive bulk e-mail
Optimized Production Technology, a production planning system created by Eliyahu M. Goldratt
Opt out, in broadcasting, when a nation or region splits from the main national output

wiki.text:
<!----------------------------------------------------------------------> <!--
From MoS:DAB: use ONE LINK per entry and SHORT descriptions. --> <!-- AVOID
piping, external links, red-links with little potential. --> <!----------------------------------------------------------------------
>

'Opt' may refer to:

* /opt, a directory in the Filesystem Hierarchy Standard *Opt out, in
  broadcasting, when a nation or region splits from the main national output *Opt-
  out, to avoid receiving unsolicited product or service information *Opting
  out, a political expression in Canada, describing the intention of a province
  to remove itself from a program administered by the federal government *Opt in
  e-mail, the option to receive bulk e-mail

The abbreviation 'Opt' may refer to:

* Option key, a modifier key on Apple keyboards

The acronym 'OPT' may refer to:

* Occupied Palestinian Territory
* Optional Practical Training, a temporary employment authorization for
  F-1 students
* Optimized Production Technology, a production planning system created by
  Eliyahu M. Goldratt
* Population Matters, (formerly known as the Optimum Population Trust), a UK
  charity devoted to tackling overpopulation.
wiki.title: opt
